GG.title: **GG (ChuGL Graphics Manager)**
GG.description: Static class providing core ChuGL graphics and audio-visual programming functionality. Use `GG.nextFrame() => now;` to advance to the next frame in a render loop.
functions: **Methods:**

```chuck
NextFrameEvent nextFrame()
```
Registers the calling shred to be notified on the next graphics frame. Use with `GG.nextFrame() => now;` in a render loop.

```chuck
GScene scene()
```
Get the current default scene.

```chuck
GScene scene(GScene scene)
```
Set the current scene.

```chuck
GCamera camera()
```
Get the default camera.

```chuck
float dt()
```
Get the delta time (frame time) in seconds for the graphics thread.

```chuck
int fc()
```
Get the frame count since start.

```chuck
float fps()
```
Get the current frames per second.

```chuck
void fps(int fps)
```
Set the target frame rate limit.

```chuck
float mouseX()
```
Get the current mouse X position.

```chuck
float mouseY()
```
Get the current mouse Y position.

```chuck
float frameWidth()
```
Get the framebuffer width in pixels.

```chuck
float frameHeight()
```
Get the framebuffer height in pixels.

```chuck
float windowWidth()
```
Get the window width in pixels.

```chuck
float windowHeight()
```
Get the window height in pixels.

```chuck
void windowTitle(string title)
```
Set the window title.

```chuck
void fullscreen()
```
Set the window to fullscreen mode.

```chuck
void windowed(int width, int height)
```
Set the window to windowed mode with given dimensions.

```chuck
void windowed()
```
Set the window to windowed mode with previous size.

```chuck
int autoUpdate()
```
Get whether GGen transforms are automatically updated each frame.

```chuck
void autoUpdate(int autoUpdate)
```
Set whether GGen transforms are automatically updated.

```chuck
void bloom(int connect)
```
Connect or disconnect the bloom post-processing effect.

```chuck
BloomPass bloomPass()
```
Get the default bloom pass.

```chuck
OutputPass outputPass()
```
Get the default output pass.

```chuck
GPass rootPass()
```
Get the root pass of the render graph.

```chuck
ScenePass scenePass()
```
Get the default scene render pass.

```chuck
void unregisterShred()
```
Unregister the calling shred from the graphics loop.

GGen.title: **GGen (Graphics Generator)**
GGen.description: Base class for all ChuGL graphics objects in the scene graph. Provides transform manipulation (position, rotation, scale), parent-child hierarchy, and per-frame update callbacks. Connect to a scene with `myGGen --> GG.scene();`
functions: **Methods:**

```chuck
vec3 pos()
```
Get local position.

```chuck
GGen pos(vec3 pos)
```
Set local position.

```chuck
GGen pos(float x, float y, float z)
```
Set local position.

```chuck
float posX()
```
Get local X position.

```chuck
GGen posX(float pos)
```
Set local X position.

```chuck
float posY()
```
Get local Y position.

```chuck
GGen posY(float pos)
```
Set local Y position.

```chuck
float posZ()
```
Get local Z position.

```chuck
GGen posZ(float pos)
```
Set local Z position.

```chuck
vec3 posWorld()
```
Get world position.

```chuck
GGen posWorld(vec3 pos)
```
Set world position.

```chuck
vec3 rot()
```
Get rotation as euler angles (radians).

```chuck
vec3 rot(vec3 eulers)
```
Set rotation as euler angles.

```chuck
GGen rotX(float radians)
```
Set X rotation.

```chuck
GGen rotY(float radians)
```
Set Y rotation.

```chuck
GGen rotZ(float radians)
```
Set Z rotation.

```chuck
GGen rotateX(float radians)
```
Rotate incrementally on X axis.

```chuck
GGen rotateY(float radians)
```
Rotate incrementally on Y axis.

```chuck
GGen rotateZ(float radians)
```
Rotate incrementally on Z axis.

```chuck
GGen rotate(vec3 eulers)
```
Rotate incrementally by euler angles.

```chuck
GGen rotateOnLocalAxis(vec3 axis, float radians)
```
Rotate on a local axis.

```chuck
GGen rotateOnWorldAxis(vec3 axis, float radians)
```
Rotate on a world axis.

```chuck
GGen lookAt(vec3 pos)
```
Rotate to look at a world position.

```chuck
vec3 sca()
```
Get local scale.

```chuck
GGen sca(vec3 scale)
```
Set local scale.

```chuck
GGen sca(float scale)
```
Set uniform local scale.

```chuck
float scaX()
```
Get local X scale.

```chuck
float scaY()
```
Get local Y scale.

```chuck
float scaZ()
```
Get local Z scale.

```chuck
vec3 scaWorld()
```
Get world scale.

```chuck
GGen translate(vec3 translation)
```
Translate by a vector.

```chuck
GGen translateX(float amt)
```
Translate on X axis.

```chuck
GGen translateY(float amt)
```
Translate on Y axis.

```chuck
GGen translateZ(float amt)
```
Translate on Z axis.

```chuck
vec3 forward()
```
Get the forward direction vector in world space.

```chuck
vec3 right()
```
Get the right direction vector in world space.

```chuck
vec3 up()
```
Get the up direction vector in world space.

```chuck
GGen parent()
```
Get parent GGen.

```chuck
GGen child(int n)
```
Get nth child.

```chuck
int numChildren()
```
Get number of children.

```chuck
void detach()
```
Detach from parent and children.

```chuck
void detachParent()
```
Detach from parent.

```chuck
void detachChildren()
```
Detach all children.

```chuck
void update(float dt)
```
Per-frame update callback. Override for custom logic.

GScene.title: **GScene (Scene Graph)**
GScene.description: Scene container managing the scene graph, lights, camera, ambient lighting, and background color. Extends GGen.
functions: **Methods:**

```chuck
void backgroundColor(vec3 color)
```
Set the background color.

```chuck
vec3 backgroundColor()
```
Get the background color.

```chuck

```

```chuck
vec3 ambient()
```

```chuck

```
Set the main camera.

```chuck
GCamera camera()
```
Get the main camera.

```chuck
GLight light()
```
Get the first light in the scene.

```chuck
GLight[] lights()
```
Get all lights in the scene.

```chuck
void envMap(Texture envMap)
```
Set the environment map for skybox reflections.

```chuck
void skybox(Material skybox)
```
Set the skybox material.

GCamera.title: **GCamera (Camera)**
GCamera.description: Camera class supporting perspective and orthographic projection modes with coordinate conversion utilities. Extends GGen.
functions: **Methods:**


```chuck
float clipNear()
```
Get the near clip plane distance.

```chuck
float clipFar()
```
Get the far clip plane distance.

```chuck
void aspect(float aspect)
```
Set a fixed aspect ratio.

```chuck
float aspect()
```
Get the aspect ratio.

```chuck
void viewSize(float size)
```
Set orthographic view height.

```chuck
float viewSize()
```
Get orthographic view height.

```chuck
vec3 screenCoordToWorldPos(vec2 screen_pos, float distance)
```
Convert screen coordinates to world position.

```chuck
vec2 worldPosToScreenCoord(vec3 world_pos)
```
Convert world position to screen coordinates.

```chuck
vec3 NDCToWorldPos(vec3 clip_pos)
```
Convert normalized device coordinates to world position.

GMesh.title: **GMesh (Mesh)**
GMesh.description: Renderable mesh combining a Geometry and a Material. Extends GGen. Create with `GMesh mesh(myGeometry, myMaterial);` or set geometry/material after construction.
constructors:
```chuck
GMesh(Geometry geo, Material mat)
```
Construct with a geometry and material.
functions: **Methods:**

```chuck
Geometry geo()
```
Get the geometry.

```chuck
GMesh geo(Geometry geometry)
```
Set the geometry.

```chuck
Material mat()
```
Get the material.

```chuck
GMesh mat(Material material)
```
Set the material.

```chuck
void mesh(Geometry geometry, Material material)
```
Set both geometry and material.

```chuck
int shadowed()
```
Get shadow receiving flag.

```chuck
void shadowed(int receives_shadow)
```
Set shadow receiving.

GCube.title: **GCube (Cube Mesh)**

GText.title: **GText (Text Rendering)**
GText.description: Text rendering in 3D space with font support, wrapping, and alignment. Extends GGen. Builtin fonts: "chugl:cousine-regular", "chugl:karla-regular", "chugl:proggy-tiny", "chugl:proggy-clean".
functions: **Methods:**

```chuck

```

```chuck
string text()
```

```chuck

```

```chuck

```
Set the text color (RGB).

```chuck
void color(vec4 color)
```
Set the text color (RGBA).

```chuck
void alpha(float alpha)
```
Set the alpha channel.

```chuck
void size(float size)
```
Set the font size scale.

```chuck
void align(int alignment_mode)
```
Set text alignment (0=left, 1=center, 2=right).

```chuck

```

```chuck

```

```chuck

```

GFlyCamera.description: First-person fly camera with WASD movement and mouse look. Extends GCamera.

Color.title: **Color (Color Utility)**
Color.description: Utility class for color operations and conversions. Provides named color constants and conversion between RGB, HSV, and hex formats.

```chuck
vec3 grayscale(vec3 rgb)
```

Gamepad.title: **Gamepad (Controller Input)**
Gamepad.description: Static class for reading gamepad/controller input. Supports up to 16 controllers with per-frame state updates.

```chuck
int buttonDown(int gamepadId, int buttonId)
```

```chuck

```
